Subjects stable 4 mg oral dose Risperidone implant two three , 300 mg , Risperidone Implants . All implant place inner aspect upper arm . Plasma concentration Risperidone active moiety measure prior placement Risperidone Implants , throughout implantation period , re-converting oral Risperidone follow removal Risperidone Implants .
